Indented text blocks (blockquotes) are rendered as paragraphs with a class of "indent-*"
.
Paragraph text

    This is a blockquote.
    It can span multiple lines.
.
<p>Paragraph text</p>
<p class="indent-1">This is a blockquote.
It can span multiple lines.</p>
.

Indented text blocks are separated by blank lines
.
Paragraph text

    Blockquote text

    Blockquote text
    
    Blockquote text

Paragraph text
.
<p>Paragraph text</p>
<p class="indent-1">Blockquote text</p>
<p class="indent-1">Blockquote text</p>
<p class="indent-1">Blockquote text</p>
<p>Paragraph text</p>
.

Indents are counted in multiples of four spaces or one tab
.
Paragraph text

    Blockquote text

        Blockquote text

		Blockquote text

	Blockquote text

Paragraph text
.
<p>Paragraph text</p>
<p class="indent-1">Blockquote text</p>
<p class="indent-2">Blockquote text</p>
<p class="indent-2">Blockquote text</p>
<p class="indent-1">Blockquote text</p>
<p>Paragraph text</p>
.

Text indents are normalized to four spaces
.
Paragraph text

 Paragraph text

  Paragraph text

   Paragraph text

    Blockquote text

     Blockquote text

      Blockquote text

       Blockquote text

        Blockquote text
.
<p>Paragraph text</p>
<p>Paragraph text</p>
<p>Paragraph text</p>
<p>Paragraph text</p>
<p class="indent-1">Blockquote text</p>
<p class="indent-1">Blockquote text</p>
<p class="indent-1">Blockquote text</p>
<p class="indent-1">Blockquote text</p>
<p class="indent-2">Blockquote text</p>
.

Escapes, html entities, and inline markers function within indented text blocks
.
text with **inlines**, \[backslash escapes\], typography(tm), "smart quotes", character references (&#x1f600;) &amp;&nbsp;entities.

    text with **inlines**, \[backslash escapes\], typography(tm), "smart quotes", character references (&#x1f600;) &amp;&nbsp;entities.
.
<p>text with <strong>inlines</strong>, [backslash escapes], typography‚Ñ¢, ‚Äúsmart quotes‚Äù, character references (üòÄ) &amp;¬†entities.</p>
<p class="indent-1">text with <strong>inlines</strong>, [backslash escapes], typography‚Ñ¢, ‚Äúsmart quotes‚Äù, character references (üòÄ) &amp;¬†entities.</p>
.

Thematic breaks and headings do not receive the indent class
.
    * * *

    ---

    # ATX Heading

    SEText Heading
    --------------
.
<hr />
<hr />
<h1>ATX Heading</h1>
<h2>SEText Heading</h2>
.

Indented quotes must be separated from paragraphs by blank lines
.

Paragraph text:
    This is not a quote!
    It is part of the paragraph!
more paragraph text.

Foo
    bar
        baz

    Foo
bar
baz

    Foo
    bar
baz
.
<p>Paragraph text:
This is not a quote!
It is part of the paragraph!
more paragraph text.</p>
<p>Foo
bar
baz</p>
<p>Foo
bar
baz</p>
<p>Foo
bar
baz</p>
.

This is true whenever the first line is indented four spaces beyond the rest of the paragraph
.
        foo
    bar
.
<p class="indent-1">foo
bar</p>
.

Blank lines around indented quotes are not rendered.
.

    
    foo
    

.
<p class="indent-1">foo</p>
.

Trailing spaces are not rendered in blockquotes.
.
    foo  
.
<p class="indent-1">foo</p>
.

Code fences get the indent class
.
    ```
    aaa
    ```
.
<pre><code class="indent-1">aaa
</code></pre>
.

Link reference definitions work even if they are indented
.
    [foo]: /url "title"

[foo]
.
<p><a href="/url" title="title">foo</a></p>
.

The indent class is given to paragraphs inside blockquote elements
.
    > # Foo
    > bar
    > baz
.
<blockquote>
<h1>Foo</h1>
<p class="indent-1">bar
baz</p>
</blockquote>
.

Attributes must be indented the same amount as the text they modify
.
Paragraph text

    Blockquote text {.test}

    Blockquote text
    {.test}

    Paragraph text
{.test}

    Paragraph text
    paragraph text
{.test}
.
<p>Paragraph text</p>
<p class="indent-1 test">Blockquote text</p>
<p class="indent-1 test">Blockquote text</p>
<p class="test">Paragraph text</p>
<p class="test">Paragraph text
paragraph text</p>
.

.
